data.name: The Oni Sellsword
data.detailed_description:
A princess has gone missing but who should answer the call? Why, Xavienne- the snarky oni from another world- of course! Who did you expect? She'll gather two of her "buddies" and journey to hell and back to save her best friend. A short RPG with a simple twist and tactical combat with a plot driven by unique characters.

Features

  • A brisk story rife with charm.
  • Three playable characters each with starkly different personalities and abilities.
  • Tactical party-based, turn-based combat that requires figuring out how to dismantle your enemies' forces, yet simple enough for all gamers!
  • Two character-based story decisions, leading to two different endings.
data.about_the_game:
A princess has gone missing but who should answer the call? Why, Xavienne- the snarky oni from another world- of course! Who did you expect? data.short_description: A totally free, short-but-sweet RPG with an unlikely hero. Journey across worlds as Xavienne to save her best friend, the beautiful Princess La.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Monitor that supports 1600x900 resolution, DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Graphics: Monitor that supports 1920x1080 resolution
  • Additional Notes: This game's engine reportedly sometimes has performance issues on certain laptops.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains some brief, vulgar language and implied sexual content. Recommended for teens and up.
